title: ‘Buckle Up’—Bitcoin And Crypto Brace For A Huge Fed Flip, Predicted To Spark A Price Boom
description: Bitcoin and crypto prices are braced for Federal Reserve chair Jerome Powell’s semi-annual testimony before lawmakers...
content:
Bitcoin and crypto have rebounded after a major escalation in the Israel-Iran conflict sent prices spiraling amid fears of a doomsday scenario.
